text: John Dalton Alderson (3 February 1929 in Glen Innes â€“ 6 November 2022 in Karaka) was a New Zealand cricketer who played for Canterbury in the Plunket Shield in the 1949/50 and 1950/51. ==Other websites== * * Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:New Zealand cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Auckland
title: John Alderson (cricketer)
